title: FS:  Four PSA 6 centered: Conroy, Dougherty, Donovan, Howard
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  Four PSA 6 centered: Conroy, Dougherty, Donovan, Howard
posts.post_content:
Each with truly great centering, pp gift, add $3 for each mailing.   Or would trade all 4 as a group for one card, t206 or not. 

Dougherty  $340  (better centering than one that just went for $350)
Conroy       $280 (better centering than one that just went for $293)
Howard       $250  (better centering than one that just went for $240)
Donovan   $220  (again, slight premium for centering)
